name: World Gymnastics Athletics Cup
description:
Become strong and dexterous athlete, jump over different interesting obstacles and pave your way to a glorious victory with World Gymnastics Athletics Cup! Join this fantastic tournament to master your sports skills up to a perfect level and have fun!
Take a deep breath, keep calm and start the contest! Your mission is absolutely clear - jump on different interesting bars through stadium, beach or gym, be as fast, flexible and nimble as you can and reach the farthest check point ever! Perform different stunts and tricks, jump and turn, train your skills and become a real champion of this game!
Be really careful and attentive, because your path is full of difficulties! Don’t forget to mind that there are various types of difficult bars like reducing bar, moving bar or disappearing bar which would prevent your successful passing; and bars with the positive effects like hasten bar and regular bar! Use different power-ups to succeed in this contest and have fun playing World Gymnastics Athletics Cup!
Earn points for successfully passed checkpoints, collect various boosters and unlock new types of characters to play for and interesting locations! Learn how is it to be the athlete and enjoy that feel!
World Gymnastics Athletics Cup features:
• Interesting athlete jumping simulator
• Various kinds of difficulty levels
• Great choice of characters to play for
• Simple and intuitive controls
Get ready for the most interesting athletes tournament ever! Try our new World Gymnastics Athletics Cup and become a real champion in this fantastic sport!
